articles.description: The KPL, as it was known then, will now be called the Maharaja Trophy T20 and feature six teams
articles.content:
NewsThe KPL, as it was known then, will now be called the Maharaja Trophy T20 and feature six teams
Devdutt Padikkal is expected to be part of the Maharaja Trophy T20  •  Karnataka Premier League
